sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-content>
    <v-container fluid id="container">
      <v-row no-gutters id="row">
        <v-col cols="6" id="col">
          <draw v-bind:parent-col="drawCol" ref="draw"></draw>
        </v-col>
        <v-col cols="6"
          <chat></chat>
        </v-col>
      </v-row>
    </v-container>
  </v-content>
</template>

<script>
import Vue from 'vue'
import Axios from 'axios'
import VueAxios from 'vue-axios'
import ActionCable from 'actioncable'

const axios = Axios
Vue.prototype.$axios = axios

const cable = ActionCable.createConsumer('ws:192.168.56.102:3000/cable')
Vue.prototype.$cable = cable

Vue.use(VueAxios, Axios)

import Draw from './Draw.vue'
import Chat from './Chat.vue'

Vue.prototype.$messageChannel = cable.subscriptions.create( "RoomChannel",{
  received: function(data) {
    //　↓もうちょいスマートなやり方　模索するべし
    if(data['message']){
      document.getElementById('messages').insertAdjacentHTML('beforeend', data['message']);
    }
    if(data['data']){
      drawLine(data['data'].fromx, data['data'].fromy, data['data'].tox, data['data'].toy, data['data'].color);
    }
  },
})

function drawLine(){
}
function canvasResize(){
}

document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => {
  var col = document.getElementById("col")
  canvasResize(col)
})

export default {
  props: ['key1'],
  data () {
    return {
      drawCol: 'null',
      drawer: null,
      contents: [
        {title: 'Paint', icon: 'mdi-brush'},
        {title: 'Games', icon: 'mdi-gamepad-variant-outline'},
        {title: 'Movie', icon: 'mdi-youtube'}
      ],
      menus: [
        {title: 'Menu1', icon: 'mdi-help-circle-outline'},
        {title: 'Menu2', icon: 'mdi-help-circle-outline'},
        {title: 'Menu3', icon: 'mdi-help-circle-outline'},
        {title: 'Menu4', icon: 'mdi-help-circle-outline'}
      ]
    }
  },
  mounted() {
    this.drawCol = document.getElementById("col")
    drawLine = this.drawLine
    canvasResize = this.canvasResize
  },
  created(){
    this.key1.updateContents(this.contents)
    this.key1.updateViewNav(true)
  },
  beforeRouteLeave (to, from, next) {
    console.log('でていくんだね')
    next();
  },
  components: {
    Draw,
    Chat
  },
  methods: {
    drawLine(fromx, fromy, tox, toy, color) {
      this.$refs.draw.drawLine(fromx, fromy, tox, toy, color);
    },
    canvasResize(col){
      this.$refs.draw.canvasResize(col);
    }
  },
  name: 'chatroom'
}
</script>

<style>
#container {
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%
}
#row {
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%
}
#col {
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%
}
</style>
